title: Raw Highlanders/ Yankees Tobacco cards, etc for sale

posts.post_title: Raw Highlanders/ Yankees Tobacco cards, etc for sale
posts.post_content:
Continuing the Yankees sale: 

Pre-war raw cards. "Sold" in the comments section trumps all ongoing negotiations. Shipping will be $3.50, no matter how many cards you purchase. Thanks for looking! PM me for photos.
